alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 3:05AM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Locally higher gusts possible along the western slopes of the Green Mountains. * WHERE...The northern Adirondacks of New York, Champlain Valley of Vermont, western slopes of the Green Mountains, and Northeast Kingdom highlands. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet snow accumulation on trees and power lines will increase the likelihood of power outages.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
